title: BCA interview
content: Hmm yeah so my bca interview for pes is tmrw, what kind of bca questions would they ask???

comments.body: They would ask some questions on the basics from your 11th and 12th cs subject
Lol the interview finished like 3 hours ago

Umm well lol I got a call saying I wasn't selected, the interview was ok like they didn't ask more about myself just like 2 question then immediately it went to whole bca questions like what is int? What is oop? Hmm the reason they didn't accept me is cuz they said my basics in c++ we're bad, I agree cuz I couldn't give proper definition I was always stuttering and the answer was overall messy,(they'll give the results the next day) also a heads up they'll call u asking for feedback and ask u personal questions I was not expecting that and cracked lol one of my hobbies were to read when she asked what author I froze up cuz for some reason no name was coming to my head

The interview is relatively easier, my interview lasted a bare 10 mins.
They ask basic 11th & 12th cs questions and a few general questions.
Happy that it went well for u
